ref: Jour: Physical Review, Part C, Nuclear Physics, Vol.81, p.012801 (2010)
title: Updated S factors for the 7Be(p,g)8B reaction

x4codes.hlp: University of Washington, Seattle, WA, United States of America
Tri University Meson Facility, Vancouver, B.C., Canada

x4freetext: Updated S factors for the 7Be(p,g)8B reaction

x4codes.hlp: University of Washington, Seattle, WA, United States of America

x4freetext: High purity (40-63%) 7Be targets on Mo plates with
Number of target atoms determined from 7Be activity
Collimated Ge detector used to measure 7Be activity.
Data in sub.3,5,7 replaced acc.to new reference
Beam energy calibration determined using resonances
Alpha particles detected in uncollimated, close
geometry with a large Si surface barrier detector.
Normalized to best fit to BE3 data.
Additional uncertainty of 2.3% applies to each
Data received by email from A.Junghans,
No reply to author proof from A. Junghans.

x4headers.headerHelp: Sum of projectile and target energies in c.m.s.
Value of quantity specified under REACTION

compNotes: CONVERTED INC-ENERGY C.M. TO LAB: EN_LAB=EN_CM*1.1436276

Data taken from tab. 1 of Phys.Rev.C 81,012801
